description: Barak, Ehud, 1942- -- Photographs; Libai, David -- Photographs
label: Retired Chief of Staff, Ehud Barak who joint the Labour party Sunday 18 July 1995 and was appointed by PM Rabin as the Interior Minister entered to his office the next day replaycing the temporary Min. David Libai (remaining Minister for Justice).
